# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Special Instructions

None.

```julia
using Printf
function wrap_string(str::AbstractString, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(str, r"\s")
    wrapped, cur_width = ["$words[1]"], length(words[1])
    for word in words[2:end]
        if cur_width + length(word) + 1 <= text_width
            cur_width += length(word) + 1
            push!(wrapped, word)
        else
            cur_width = length(word)
            wrapped = [join(wrapped, "\n"), "$word"]
        end
    end
    join(wrapped, "\n")
end

@printf("%s", wrap_string("Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt"))
```
